body_html:
@yuefengz
Yuefeng,

We are working for TensorFlow enhancement and optimization for Alibaba's production clusters. And
TF's DistributionStrategy looks a promising feature for us since it could reduce the overhead for user writing distributed execution plan. However, there are still some limitations regarding to DistributionStrategy, as the one mentioned by Siyu.

Any comments from you side is hight welcome and much appreciated.

body:
@yuefengz 
Yuefeng, 

We are working for TensorFlow enhancement and optimization for Alibaba's production clusters. And 
TF's DistributionStrategy looks a promising feature for us since it could reduce the overhead for user writing distributed execution plan. However, there are still some limitations regarding to DistributionStrategy, as the one mentioned by Siyu. 

Any comments from you side is hight welcome and much appreciated.
